item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，必和必拓与淡水河谷就巴西大坝灾难的英国诉讼达成 14 亿美元和解协议
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，全球矿商必和必拓集团（BHP Group）和淡水河谷公司（Vale）已出价约 14 亿美元，以解决在英国发生的一起与巴西有史以来最严重的环境灾难之一有关的集体诉讼。【原文：Global miners BHP Group and Vale have offered around $1.4 billion to settle a class action lawsuit in the United Kingdom tied to one of Brazil's worst-ever environmental disasters, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 博斯蒂克劳动力市场风险上升，但 9 月会议前仍需大量数据
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周四表示，就业市场面临的风险已经增加，但在美国联邦储备委员会下次会议之前承诺降息仍然为时过早，因为关键数据尚未出炉，而且预计未来几个月通胀率仍将上升。【原文：Risks to the job market have increased, but it remains too soon to commit to interest rate cuts before the next meeting of the U.S. Federal Reserve with key data still to come and inflation still expected to rise in coming months, Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国联邦法院称其系统成为 "近期升级的网络攻击 "的目标
item.description: 联邦司法机构在周四的一份声明中说，其 IT 系统受到了 "最近升级的、复杂的、持续性的网络攻击"。【原文：The federal judiciary said in a statement Thursday that its IT systems have been targeted by "recent escalated cyberattacks of a sophisticated and persistent nature."】

item.title: 芯科最大股东将投票反对出售给 CoreWeave
item.description: Core Scientific 的最大股东 Two Seas Capital 周四发表公开信，表示将投票反对将公司出售给 CoreWeave 的提议。【原文：Two Seas Capital, the largest shareholder of Core Scientific , issued an open letter on Thursday saying it would vote against the company's proposed sale to CoreWeave .】

item.title: 巴西汽车出口受阿根廷推动将大幅增长；关税影响当地销量
item.description: 巴西汽车制造商协会 Anfavea 周四表示，2025 年巴西汽车出口的增长幅度将远远超过此前的预期。【原文：Brazil's auto exports are set to grow much more than previously expected in 2025, automakers' association Anfavea said on Thursday, crediting strong demand from neighboring Argentina for the upward revision to its forecast.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，通用汽车将从 CATL 进口电动汽车电池
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，通用汽车将从中国电池巨头 CATL 进口电动汽车电池。【原文：General Motors will import electric vehicle batteries from Chinese battery giant CATL , The Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 备忘录显示花旗集团聘请摩根大通的贝加尔担任并购部门联席主管
item.description: 据路透社周四看到的一份内部备忘录显示，花旗集团已任命摩根大通的吉列尔莫-巴伊瓜尔（Guillermo Baygual）为并购部门联席主管，因为这家美国银行正努力扩大其在利润丰厚的交易业务中的份额。【原文：Citigroup has appointed JPMorgan Chase's Guillermo Baygual as co-head of mergers and acquisitions, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Thursday, as the U.S. bank seeks to grow its share of the lucrative dealmaking business.】

item.title: 在人工智能产业寻求投资回报之际，OpenAI 推出 GPT-5
item.description: OpenAI 周四发布了其 GPT-5 人工智能模型，这是一项帮助改变全球商业和文化的技术的最新成果，备受期待。【原文：OpenAI launched on Thursday its GPT-5 artificial intelligence model, the highly anticipated latest installment of a technology that has helped transform global business and culture.】

item.title: 尽管作物价格低廉，但 Nutrien 预计农民将使用更多化肥
item.description: 世界顶级钾肥生产商 Nutrien 公司高管周四对分析师表示，尽管部分作物价格处于多年低位，但该公司预计今年秋季北美农民将增加化肥使用量，2026 年全球钾肥市场将保持良好态势。【原文：Nutrien , the world's top potash producer, expects increased fertilizer use by North American farmers this fall and a good global potash market in 2026 despite some crop prices at multi-year lows, company executives told analysts on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道摩根大通否认因宗教原因关闭与堪萨斯州前州长有关的账户
item.description: 据路透社看到的一封信称，摩根大通否认因宗教原因关闭了一个与堪萨斯州前州长萨姆-布朗巴克（Sam Brownback）有关联的账户，并且在关闭该账户前没有收到要求他提供的信息。【原文：JPMorgan Chase denied it closed an account linked to former Kansas Governor Sam Brownback on religious grounds, and did not receive information it requested from him before shutting the account, according to a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国法官撤销美联储借记卡 "刷卡费 "规定，但暂停执行上诉令
item.description: 一名美国法官撤销了美联储的 "刷卡费 "规定，该规定对银行向商户收取的借记卡交易处理费用设定了上限，这一裁决有利于长期以来一直抱怨支付费用过高的零售商。【原文：A U.S. judge has vacated the Federal Reserve’s “swipe fees” regulation that capped the amount banks charge merchants for processing debit transactions, in a ruling favoring retailers that have long complained about paying inflated amounts.】

item.title: 埃里森概述了新派拉蒙的愿景，重点是内容和技术
item.description: 派拉蒙新任董事长兼首席执行官大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）在一封纪念与 Skydance Media 合并完成的公开信中，概述了将这家百年娱乐公司转型为技术驱动型媒体企业的计划。【原文：Paramount's new chairman and chief executive, David Ellison, outlined a plan to transform the century-old entertainment company into a technology-driven media enterprise in an open letter marking the completion of the merger with Skydance Media.】

item.title: 制药商竞相推出首款减肥药
item.description: 由于礼来公司（Eli Lilly）的 Zepbound 和诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）的 Wegovy 越来越受欢迎，预计到 2030 年代初，整个行业的减肥药物收入将超过 1,500 亿美元。【原文：Weight-loss drugs are expected to pull in more than $150 billion in industry-wide revenue by the early 2030s, thanks to the ever-growing popularity of Eli Lilly's Zepbound and Novo Nordisk's Wegovy.】

item.title: 印度总理莫迪与巴西总统卢拉同意加强贸易和技术合作
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）和巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva）周四在一份声明中表示，双方同意加强在贸易、技术、能源、国防、农业、卫生和人文关系方面的合作。【原文：India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Brazil's President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva on Thursday agreed to enhance cooperation in trade, technology, energy, defence, agriculture, health and people-to-people ties, Modi's office said in a statement.】

item.title: 受美国经济疲软影响，宏利财报不及预期，股价下跌
item.description: 加拿大宏利金融公司周四公布的季度盈利低于分析师预期，主要原因是美国信贷和死亡率损失增加，该公司股价下跌超过 3%。【原文：Canadian insurer Manulife Financial shares fell by more than 3% on Thursday after it reported quarterly earnings below analysts' estimates, largely due to elevated credit and mortality losses in the United States.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，加拿大国防审查为坚持使用 F-35 战斗机提供了理由
item.description: 周四，两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，加拿大国防官员强烈要求渥太华坚持购买88架洛克希德-马丁公司生产的F-35战斗机的计划，而不是拆分订单。【原文：Canadian defense officials have strongly made the case that Ottawa should stick to a plan to buy 88 Lockheed Martin Corp F-35 fighter jets rather than splitting the order, two sources familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国初创企业寻求为欧洲衰落的电池偶像 Northvolt 充电
item.description: 硅谷初创公司Lyten周四表示，它已同意收购破产的Northvolt公司在瑞典和德国的剩余资产，这有可能重燃欧洲建立国内电动汽车电池产业的希望，以减少对中国的依赖。【原文：Silicon Valley startup Lyten said on Thursday it had agreed to buy bankrupt Northvolt's remaining assets in Sweden and Germany, potentially reviving Europe's hopes of building a domestic electric vehicle battery industry to reduce reliance on China.】

item.title: 纽约联储发现 7 月份长期预期通胀率上升
item.description: 纽约联储周四公布的数据显示，尽管美国家庭对各自当前和未来财务状况的看法有所提高，但7月份美国人对长期通胀前景的看法仍有所恶化。【原文：Americans' longer-term inflation outlook deteriorated in July even as households boosted their views on the current and future state of their respective financial situations, according to data released on Thursday by the New York Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 对特朗普要求英特尔首席执行官辞职的反应
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）要求英特尔公司首席执行官陈立武（Lip-Bu Tan）立即辞职，原因是他在这家陷入困境的芯片制造商担任领导职务仅数月后，就对其在中国企业的大量投资感到担忧。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has demanded the immediate resignation of Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan over concerns of his extensive investments in Chinese firms, just months after he assumed leadership of the struggling chipmaker.】

item.title: 特朗普关税打击印度服装制造商，美国买家称将转移生产
item.description: 自从唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）本周对印度征收关税以来，服装制造商 Pearl Global（其美国客户名单包括 Gap 和 Kohl's）不断接到午夜恐慌电话，并发出最后通牒：要么分担关税损失，要么将生产迁出印度。【原文：Ever since Donald Trump's tariff salvo on India this week, garment maker Pearl Global - whose U.S. client list includes Gap and Kohl's - has been receiving midnight panic calls with an ultimatum: share the tariff hit or move production out of India.】

item.title: 派拉蒙与 Skydance 完成 80 亿美元的合并，此前已就《60 分钟》诉讼达成和解
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）和天舞传媒公司（Skydance Media）宣布，已完成一年多前宣布的价值 84 亿美元的合并，结束了政治审查和股东担忧等漫长的交易过程。【原文：Paramount Global and Skydance Media have completed their $8.4 billion merger that was announced more than a year ago, the companies said, capping a long-drawn deal process marked by political scrutiny and shareholder concerns.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：沃勒成为特朗普团队中美联储主席的热门人选
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周四援引知情人士的话报道，美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）正在成为特朗普总统团队中担任央行主席的热门人选。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller is emerging as a top candidate to serve as the central bank's chair among President Trump's team, Bloomberg News on Thursday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国初创企业 Lyten 收购陷入困境的欧洲电池制造商 Northvolt
item.description: 美国电池初创公司Lyten周四表示，已同意收购破产的瑞典电池制造商Northvolt的大部分股份，这可能为这家曾被视为该地区应对亚洲竞争对手的欧洲公司提供了一条退路。【原文：U.S. battery startup Lyten has agreed to buy most of bankrupt Swedish battery maker Northvolt, it said on Thursday, potentially offering a way back for the European company that was once seen as the region's answer to rivals in Asia.】

item.title: Paxos Trust 与纽约达成 4850 万美元的 Binance 相关和解协议
item.description: 纽约州金融服务监管机构周四表示，Paxos Trust 达成了一项 4850 万美元的和解协议，以解决纽约州对其未能对前合作伙伴 Binance 进行充分尽职调查以及反洗钱计划存在系统性失误的指控。【原文：Paxos Trust reached a $48.5 million settlement to resolve New York charges it failed to conduct sufficient due diligence of its former partner Binance, and had systemic failures in its anti-money laundering program, the state's financial services regulator said on Thursday.】

item.title: 因美国公用事业增长，Sempra 盈利超出预期
item.description: 受美国公用事业业务增长和成本削减的影响，能源基础设施公司 Sempra 周四公布的第二季度利润超出分析师预期。【原文：Energy infrastructure company Sempra beat analysts' estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by growth in its U.S. utility operations and cost cuts.】

item.title: ESPN-NFL 交易面临监管障碍
item.description: 据法律专家和业内人士透露，美国国家橄榄球联盟与沃尔特-迪斯尼公司（Walt Disney）达成的交易将面临美国司法部的严格审查，在该交易中，美国国家橄榄球联盟将获得 ESPN 的股权，以换取主要媒体资产。【原文：The National Football League's deal with Walt Disney in which it will gain an equity stake in ESPN in return for prime media assets is expected to face scrutiny from the U.S. Department of Justice, according to legal experts and industry sources.】

item.title: Targa Resources 天然气产量创历史新高，利润超出预期，并推进股票回购计划
item.description: 管道运营商 Targa Resources 第二季度调整后的核心利润超出预期，原因是通过其系统运输的天然气和天然气液化气量创下历史新高。【原文：Pipeline operator Targa Resources beat second-quarter adjusted core profit estimates, driven by record-high volumes of natural gas and natural gas liquids transported through its system.】

item.title: GFL 旗下的绿色基础设施合伙公司将通过 42.5 亿美元的交易进行资本结构调整
item.description: GFL Environmental 周四表示，其帮助成立的公司 Green Infrastructure Partners 已与 Energy Capital Partners 管理的基金达成资本重组协议，企业价值为 42.5 亿美元。【原文：GFL Environmental said on Thursday that Green Infrastructure Partners, a company it helped establish, has entered into a deal to be recapitalized by funds managed by Energy Capital Partners at an enterprise value of $4.25 billion.】

item.title: 卢特尼克：美国预计每月关税收入将达 500 亿美元
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周四表示，随着对来自数十个国家的进口商品征收更高的关税，他预计美国每月的关税收入将达到500亿美元。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Thursday he expects the country is heading towards $50 billion a month in tariff revenues as higher levies on imports from dozens of countries kick in.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普关税生效后，预计不会立即实施更严厉的转运处罚
item.description: 东南亚的三位知情人士表示，预计美国不会立即对原产于一国但从另一国转运的商品实施更严厉的贸易惩罚，这缓解了人们的一大担忧。【原文：Tougher U.S. trade penalties on goods originating in one country being re-shipped from another are not expected to immediately follow new U.S. tariffs, three people in Southeast Asia with knowledge of the matter said, easing a major cause of concern.】
